p: According to the literature record of the distribution of S. sphenanthera and studies on the range of the Qinling Mountains ( Liu & Chen, 1986; Kang & Zhu, 2007), we defined the whole study area to encompass the Qinling Mountains ( Fig. 1). Latitude in this area ranges from N30 °30′ to N35 °30′ and longitude from E103 °45′ to E113 °45′. It runs across six provinces (or municipalities) from the west to the east, including Gansu, Sichuan, Shaanxi, Chongqing, Hubei, and Henan, and it covers nearly 190,000 km 2.
